column4: hi all, i want to change my laptop cpu that is a 2,8ghz p4  socket 478 with a new one that is a 3,2 ghz but i don't know if my motherboard support this new one
i have this one http://processorfinder.intel.com/Details.aspx?sSpec=SL7EY and i want to change with this http://processorfinder.intel.com/details.aspx?sSpec=SL8JZ
maybe ##hardware (or #hardware, I can never remember) can answer that
